title: A uery brefe treatise, ordrely declaring the pri[n]cipal partes of phisick that is to saye: thynges natural. Thynges not naturall. Thynges agaynst nature. Gathered, and sette forth by Christopher Langton.
author: Langton, Christopher, 1521-1578.
publicationDate: the x. day of April Anno dni. M. D. XLVII 1547]
publisher: In Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne, ouer agaynst the condyte, by Edvvard VVhitchurche,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
